content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As the first step for getting acquainted with D&A organizational structure, we suggest you getting acquainted with our leadership structure as well as key names.  \\r \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This section was already covered in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"Data & Analytics Intro\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" module, hence, you can skip it if you remember this content.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our Data & Analytics Leadership (VP and VP-1 levels) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Data & Analytics Practice Leadership team consists of 6 people led by Valentin Tsitlik, Head of D&A Practice. All of them are responsible for their disciplines and functions.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Below you can find the pictures of our leadership with descriptions of their roles at the practice. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":184458,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3cc3f324-10f6-46d4-80a1-53bf0fc5c027/Capture7.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3cc3f324-10f6-46d4-80a1-53bf0fc5c027/Capture7.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture7.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture7.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3cc3f324-10f6-46d4-80a1-53bf0fc5c027\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":701,\"height\":484},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our Data & Analytics Regional Delivery Heads \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from Senior Management team we do have Data Analytics Delivery Organization. This division helps to build a better environment for our Data & Analytics people, as well as ensure effective management and delivery models. It allows the distribution of various data skills across the globe and the investigation of new markets and talented specialists. Moreover, it is crucial that our people feel the support of the team and stay updated about the news of their region through the global and local data communications channels.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Since Data & Analytics Practice is presented all around the globe, hence the whole delivery organization is structured by geographical regions aligned with each other in terms of local legislation and work processes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the picture below see the map of regions with their respective heads. Please mind that this structure is dynamic and might change across the time. Here we will keep the most updated information. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":181460,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3523112a-46fa-4a25-aa7d-24f54c7c40d0/Capture8.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3523112a-46fa-4a25-aa7d-24f54c7c40d0/Capture8.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture8.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture8.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3523112a-46fa-4a25-aa7d-24f54c7c40d0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":513.3911637931035},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
